questions.question: When a cannon fires a cannon ball, the cannon will recoil backward because

answers.a: energy of cannon and cannon ball is conserved
answers.b: momentum of the cannon is greater than energy of the cannon ball
answers.c: momentum of the cannon ball and cannon is conserved
answers.d: energy of the cannon is greater than the energy of cannon ball
